definition: arts of healing, divination, horoscope etc/supernatural arts (old)

definition: Daoist School of the Warring States Period (475-221 BC), based on the teachings of Laozi or Lao-tze 老子[Lao3 zi3] (c. 500 BC-) and Zhuangzi 庄子 (369-286 BC)
divination combined with mystical Confucian philosopy, prevalent during the Eastern Han Dynasty (25-220)
interactions between heaven and mankind (Han Dynasty doctrine)
